task.title: Upload test results from Katalon Studio to Katalon TestOps manually

ul.li: Katalon Studio version 7.0.0 onwards supports video capture of test results when uploading them to Katalon TestOps.

context.p: Once executed in , the test results are automatically uploaded to . If the test results fail to upload automatically, you can also upload them manually.

step.cmd: Open Katalon Studio and go to the project you are working on.
Go to Test Suites or Test Suite Collection, choose your test suite, then switch to the Result tab.
Click on the Katalon TestOps dropdown menu at the top right corner and select Upload.
Choose the Team and Project you want to upload test results to.

taskbody.result: You have uploaded test results manually to Katalon TestOps from Katalon Studio.
